snippet: GOLDSCHMIDT--Beatrice C.,died June 22, 2016. Funeral arrangements private. Predeceased by her beloved husband, Henry J. Goldschmidt. Survived by her son, Lawrence E. Goldschmidt (Maya D.), and daughter, Ellen C. Goldschmidt; grandchildren, Alix (Beneth), Erica (James), and Lisa (Luke), and great-grandchildren, Eli, Nathaniel, and Leo. She was an avid reader, world traveler and lover of classical music and opera. The family will be at the home of Lawrence E. Goldschmidt from 5pm to 9pm on Thursday and from 4pm to 8pm on Friday. Donations in Bea's memory may be made to The Goldschmidt Family Scholarship Fund at Columbia College or to the Henry J. Goldschmidt Scholarship Fund at Columbia Law School. 1/3
